comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: This is Julius Bücker, an NCO pilot who later was promoted to officer rank of Leutnant. He was a winner of the Goldenen Militär Verdienst Kreuz (the so-called NCO's Blue Max), and later as an officer, the Pour le Merite. He also was wounded numerous times. He flew with Jasta 17 as a fighter pilot and scored 35 victories.
